## workflow
| workflow         | 说明                   |
| ---------------- | ---------------------- |
| cloudflare-pages | 发布到cloudflare pages |
| fly-io           | 发布到fly.io           |
| github-pages     | 发布到github pages     |
| sync-code        | 同步代码到gitlab仓库   |

## pages
```shell
# cloudflare
https://mobikarl.pages.dev/

# fly.io
https://mobikarl.fly.dev/

# gitlab
https://mobikarl.gitlab.io/mobikarl/

# github
https://mobikarl.github.io/mobikarl/
```
